creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: carton is tan with printed white branches; wooden box has inscriptions on interior and exterior of lid; wrapped in tissue; fabric is marigold yellow with cream accent; image is mottled black and grey with a tree and part of a house near bottom center
inscription:
山陰有道士　蘆荻養群鵝　安得籠之去　慙吾一字無 (At Shan-yin there is a Taoist / who raises flocks of geese among the reeds. / But how can I get to carry some off in cages? / I\'m ashamed to have not even one written word!) [Jonathan Chaves]

Poem: Kodōjin shiga no. 12; Shōyō shū no. 130
markings: poem UR red seal: 无心 {mushin} [mushin #3]; poem LL red seals: 字曰子徳 {azana iwaku Shitoku}, 静處 {seisho} [seisho #3]
signed: 古人畫并題 {Kojin ga narabini dai} (Painting and inscription by Kojin)
title: Landscape after Mi Fu
